summary.span: 实现 Berkeley 套接字接口。

span.span: Implements the Berkeley sockets interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一组丰富的方法和属性的网络通信。The class provides a rich set of methods and properties for network communications. 类使您能够同时同步和异步数据传输使用的任何通信协议中列出枚举。The class allows you to perform both synchronous and asynchronous data transfer using any of the communication protocols listed in the enumeration. 类遵循异步方法的.NET Framework 命名模式。The class follows the .NET Framework naming pattern for asynchronous methods. 例如，同步方法对应于异步和方法。For example, the synchronous method corresponds to the asynchronous and methods. 如果你的应用程序在执行期间只需要一个线程，使用以下方法，适用于同步操作模式。If your application only requires one thread during execution, use the following methods, which are designed for synchronous operation mode. - 如果使用的面向连接的 TCP 协议，你的服务器可以使用侦听连接方法。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol such as TCP, your server can listen for connections using the method. 方法处理任何传入连接请求并返回可用来与远程主机通信数据。The method processes any incoming connection requests and returns a that you can use to communicate data with the remote host. 使用此返回来调用或方法。Use this returned to call the or method. 调用方法之前调用方法如果你想要指定本地 IP 地址和端口号。Call the method prior to calling the method if you want to specify the local IP address and port number. 如果你想要为你分配了可用端口的基础服务提供程序，请使用端口号 0。Use a port number of zero if you want the underlying service provider to assign a free port for you. 如果你想要连接到侦听主机，则调用方法。If you want to connect to a listening host, call the method. 若要进行通信的数据，调用或方法。To communicate data, call the or method. - 如果使用如 UDP 是无连接协议，你不需要在所有侦听连接。If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you do not need to listen for connections at all. 调用方法以接受任何传入的数据报。Call the method to accept any incoming datagrams. 使用方法以将数据报发送到远程主机。Use the method to send datagrams to a remote host. 若要处理在执行期间使用单独的线程通信，请使用以下方法，适用于异步操作模式。To process communications using separate threads during execution, use the following methods, which are designed for asynchronous operation mode. - 如果使用的面向连接的 TCP 协议，使用， ，和方法来侦听主机的连接。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol such as TCP, use the , , and methods to connect with a listening host. 使用并或和方法进行异步通信数据。Use the and or and methods to communicate data asynchronously. 可以使用处理传入的连接请求和。Incoming connection requests can be processed using and . - 如果使用如 UDP 是无连接协议，则可以使用并来发送数据报，并和来接收数据报。If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you can use and to send datagrams, and and to receive datagrams. 如果执行套接字上的多个异步操作，它们不一定会完成启动它们的顺序中。If you perform multiple asynchronous operations on a socket, they do not necessarily complete in the order in which they are started. 当你已完成发送和接收数据，请使用方法，以禁用。When you are finished sending and receiving data, use the method to disable the . 在调用，调用方法来释放与关联的所有资源。After calling , call the method to release all resources associated with the . 类允许您配置您使用方法。The class allows you to configure your using the method. 检索这些设置，请使用方法。Retrieve these settings using the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果您正在编写相对简单的应用程序并不需要最大的性能，请考虑使用， ，和。If you are writing a relatively simple application and do not require maximum performance, consider using , , and . 这些类提供的更简单并且更加用户友好界面通信。These classes provide a simpler and more user-friendly interface to communications. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类可用于将数据发送到 HTTP 服务器并接收响应。The following code example shows how the class can be used to send data to an HTTP server and receive the response. 此示例中阻止，直到收到整个页面。This example blocks until the entire page is received. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.Socket#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Socket/CPP/socket.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.Socket#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Socket/CS/socket.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.Socket#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Socket/VB/socket.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您调用多次使用相同的字节数组，作为每个调用的参数的构造函数，您将创建多个托管与同一个基础套接字。If you call the constructor multiple times with the same byte array as the argument for each call, you will create multiple managed s with the same underlying socket. 这种做法是强烈建议不要使用。This practice is strongly discouraged.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `socketType`参数指定的类型类和`protocolType`参数指定使用的协议。The `socketType` parameter specifies the type of the class and the `protocolType` parameter specifies the protocol used by . 两个参数不是独立的。The two parameters are not independent. 通常类型是隐式的协议。Often the type is implicit in the protocol. 如果的组合类型和协议类型结果无效，此构造函数引发。If the combination of type and protocol type results in an invalid , this constructor throws a . > [!NOTE] > 如果此构造函数将引发，使用属性来获取特定错误代码。If this constructor throws a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `addressFamily`参数指定的寻址方案类使用，`socketType`参数指定的类型类，并且`protocolType`参数指定使用的协议。The `addressFamily` parameter specifies the addressing scheme that the class uses, the `socketType` parameter specifies the type of the class, and the `protocolType` parameter specifies the protocol used by . 三个参数不是独立的。The three parameters are not independent. 有些地址族限制可以使用哪些协议，使用它们，并经常类型是隐式的协议。Some address families restrict which protocols can be used with them, and often the type is implicit in the protocol. 如果地址族的组合类型和协议类型无效，此构造函数引发。If the combination of address family, type, and protocol type results in an invalid , this constructor throws a . > [!NOTE] > 如果此构造函数将引发，使用属性来获取特定错误代码。If this constructor throws a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的实例类。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of the class. [!code-cpp[Socket_Send_Recieve#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Send_Recieve/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Send_Recieve#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Send_Recieve/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Socket_Send_Recieve#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Send_Recieve/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以同步方式从侦听套接字，在连接请求队列中提取第一个挂起的连接请求，然后创建并返回一个新。 synchronously extracts the first pending connection request from the connection request queue of the listening socket, and then creates and returns a new . 不能使用此返回为接受任何其他连接的连接队列。You cannot use this returned to accept any additional connections from the connection queue. 但是，可以调用方法所返回的来标识远程主机的网络地址和端口号。However, you can call the method of the returned to identify the remote host's network address and port number. 在阻止模式下，阻止，直到传入的连接尝试排入队列。In blocking mode, blocks until an incoming connection attempt is queued. 连接被接受后，原始继续队列传入的连接请求直到您关闭它。Once a connection is accepted, the original continues queuing incoming connection requests until you close it. 如果调用此方法使用非阻塞，并请求排队，没有连接引发。If you call this method using a non-blocking , and no connection requests are queued, throws a . 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 然后再调用方法，必须首先调用方法来侦听并对传入连接请求进行排队。Before calling the method, you must first call the method to listen for and queue incoming connection requests. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例接受简单连接。The following code example accepts a simple connection. [!code-cpp[Classic Socket.Accept Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Accept Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Socket.Accept Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Accept Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Socket.Accept Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Accept Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用面向连接的协议方法以异步处理传入的连接尝试。Connection-oriented protocols can use the method to asynchronously process incoming connection attempts. 以异步方式接受连接使你能够发送和接收单独的执行线程中的数据。Accepting connections asynchronously gives you the ability to send and receive data within a separate execution thread. 然后再调用方法时，必须调用方法来侦听并对传入连接请求进行排队。Before calling the method, you must call the method to listen for and queue incoming connection requests. 若要在完成时得到通知，必须创建实现事件处理程序的回调方法\ 委托并将其到挂钩事件。To be notified of completion, you must create a callback method that implements the EventHandler\ delegate and hook it to the event. 下列属性和事件上的对象所需：The following properties and events on the object are required: - 调用方可以选择指定的现有要通过指定用于将传入连接用于属性。The caller can optionally specify an existing to use for the incoming connection by specifying the to use with the property. 如果属性为 null，一个新具有相同构造， ，并与当前并将设置为属性。If the property is null, a new is constructed with the same , , and as the current and set as the property. 调用方可能会设置属性设置为在调用之前所需的任何用户状态对象方法，以便可在回调方法中检索信息。The caller may set the property to any user state object desired before calling the method, so that the information will be retrievable in the callback method. 如果回调需要比单个对象的详细信息，可以创建一个小类来保存作为成员的其他所需的状态信息。If the callback needs more information than a single object, a small class can be created to hold the other required state information as members. （可选） 一个缓冲区可能会提供用来接收后的套接字上的数据的初始块方法成功。Optionally, a buffer may be provided in which to receive the initial block of data on the socket after the method succeeds. 在这种情况下，属性应设置为包含数据的缓冲区，以接收和属性应设置为的最大的数据的字节数，以接收缓冲区中。In this case, the property needs to be set to the buffer containing the data to receive and the property needs to be set to the maximum number of bytes of data to receive in the buffer. 这些属性可以设置使用方法。These properties can be set using the method. 在传递的缓冲区的一部分将使用在内部用于基础 Winsock AcceptEx 调用。Part of the buffer passed in will be consumed internally for use by the underlying Winsock AcceptEx call. 这意味着返回的数据量始终为的值小于属性上的提供实例。This means that the amount of data returned will always be less than the value of the property on the instance provided. 在内部使用的缓冲区数量根据不同而异的套接字地址族。The amount of the buffer used internally varies based on the address family of the socket. 所需的最小缓冲区大小是 288 个字节。The minimum buffer size required is 288 bytes. 如果指定较大的缓冲区大小，则希望一些额外的数据以外的 Winsock AcceptEx 调用收到的地址数据，并且将等待，直到收到此额外数据。If a larger buffer size is specified, then the will expect some extra data other than the address data received by the Winsock AcceptEx call and will wait until this extra data is received. 如果发生超时，将重置连接。If a timeout occurs, the connection is reset. 因此如果特定量的预期额外的数据，则应缓冲区大小设置为最小缓冲区大小加上此段中。So if extra data is expected of a specific amount, then the buffer size should be set to the minimum buffer size plus this amount. 完成回调方法应检查属性来确定如果操作是否成功。The completion callback method should examine the property to determine if the operation was successful. 事件可能在某些情况下不接受任何连接时发生，并导致属性设置为。The event can occur in some cases when no connection has been accepted and cause the property to be set to . 这可以导致端口扫描使用半开 SYN 类型扫描 (SYN-> SYN ACK-> RST 序列)。This can occur as a result of port scanning using a half-open SYN type scan (a SYN -> SYN-ACK -> RST sequence). 使用应用程序方法应准备好处理这种情况。Applications using the method should be prepared to handle this condition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用非阻塞，是好的方法，以确定是否将数据排队以进行读取，然后才能调用。If you are using a non-blocking , is a good way to determine whether data is queued for reading, before calling . 可用的数据是在读取的网络缓冲区中对排队的总数据量。The available data is the total amount of data queued in the network buffer for reading. 如果无数据排队网络缓冲区中返回 0。If no data is queued in the network buffer, returns 0. 如果远程主机关闭，或关闭的连接可能会引发。If the remote host shuts down or closes the connection, can throw a . 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将调用 IOControl 使用 FIONREAD 和可用属性的结果进行比较。The following code example compares the results of calling IOControl with FIONREAD and the Available property. [!code-cpp[NCLSocketIoControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketIoControl/CPP/iocontrolserver.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLSocketIoControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketIoControl/CS/iocontrolserver.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用面向连接的协议方法以异步处理传入的连接尝试。Connection-oriented protocols can use the method to asynchronously process incoming connection attempts. 以异步方式接受连接使你能够发送和接收单独的执行线程中的数据。Accepting connections asynchronously gives you the ability to send and receive data within a separate execution thread. 然后再调用方法时，必须调用方法来侦听并对传入连接请求进行排队。Before calling the method, you must call the method to listen for and queue incoming connection requests. 必须创建实现一个回调方法委托并将传递到其名称方法。You must create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 为此，请在最低限度下，必须通过侦听对象传递给通过`state`参数。To do this, at the very minimum, you must pass the listening object to through the `state` parameter. 如果回调需要详细信息，可以创建一个小类来保存和其他所需的信息。If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class to hold the and the other required information. 传递到此类的实例方法通过`state`参数。Pass an instance of this class to the method through the `state` parameter. 回调方法应该调用方法。Your callback method should invoke the method. 当应用程序调用，系统通常使用一个单独的线程来执行指定的回调方法，并阻止上直到检索到挂起的连接。When your application calls , the system usually uses a separate thread to execute the specified callback method and blocks on until a pending connection is retrieved. 将返回一个新对象可用于发送和接收数据与远程主机。 will return a new object that you can use to send and receive data with the remote host. 不能使用此返回为接受任何其他连接的连接队列。You cannot use this returned to accept any additional connections from the connection queue. 如果你想要阻止调用后的原始线程方法，请使用。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use . 在调用 Set 方法在回调方法时所需的原始线程继续执行。Call the Set method on a in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 系统还可能使用调用线程来调用该回调方法。The system may also use the calling thread to invoke the callback method. 在这种情况下，对返回的属性会将设置为指示方法以同步方式完成。In this case, the property on the returned will be set to indicate that the method completed synchronously. 编写回调方法的其他信息，请参阅[委托作为回调方法进行封送](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 若要取消挂起调用方法，关闭。To cancel a pending call to the method, close the . 当回调的异步操作正在进行中时，调用方法，提供给调用方法。When the method is called while an asynchronous operation is in progress, the callback provided to the method is called. 随后调用方法将引发以指示已取消该操作。A subsequent call to the method will throw an to indicate that the operation has been cancelled. > [!NOTE] > 可以使用属性所返回的来标识远程主机的网络地址和端口号。You can use the property of the returned to identify the remote host's network address and port number. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅[Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)有关错误的详细说明的文档。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 为异步缓存的执行上下文 （的安全上下文中，被模拟的用户，并在调用上下文）方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 后首次使用特定的上下文 (特定于异步方法中，特定实例和特定的回调)，以后使用该上下文将看到性能的改进。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例尝试以异步方式接收传入连接。The following code example attempts to receive an incoming connection asynchronously. [!code-cpp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/VB/source.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用面向连接的协议方法启动的连接的异步请求`remoteEP`参数。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, the method starts an asynchronous request for a connection to the `remoteEP` parameter. 如果您使用的是无连接协议，建立默认远程主机。If you are using a connectionless protocol, establishes a default remote host. 连接或以异步方式设置默认远程主机使你能够发送和接收单独的执行线程中的数据。Connecting or setting the default remote host asynchronously gives you the ability to send and receive data within a separate execution thread. 可以创建实现一个回调方法委托并将传递到其名称方法。You can create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 至少，您必须传递到通过`state`参数。At the very minimum, you must pass the to through the `state` parameter. 如果回调需要详细信息，可以创建一个小类来保存，和其他所需的信息。If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class to hold the , and the other required information. 传递到此类的实例方法通过`state`参数。Pass an instance of this class to the method through the `state` parameter. 回调方法应该调用方法。Your callback method should invoke the method. 当应用程序调用，系统将使用一个单独的线程来执行指定的回调方法，并阻止直到已成功连接或引发异常。When your application calls , the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and will block on until the connects successfully or throws an exception. 如果你想要阻止调用后的原始线程方法，请使用。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use . 在调用 Set 方法在回调方法时所需的原始线程继续执行。Call the Set method on a in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 编写回调方法的其他信息，请参阅[委托作为回调方法进行封送](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 如果使用如 UDP 是无连接协议，不需要调用之前发送和接收数据。If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you do not have to call before sending and receiving data. 可以使用和与远程主机通信。You can use and to communicate with a remote host. 如果调用，将丢弃来自指定的默认值以外的地址的任何数据报。If you do call , any datagrams that arrive from an address other than the specified default will be discarded. 如果你想要将默认远程主机到广播地址，必须先调用设置为广播和`true`。If you wish to set your default remote host to a broadcast address, you must first call and set Broadcast to `true`. 如果您不能将引发。If you cannot, will throw a . 如果您使用的是面向连接的协议，并且不会调用之前调用，基础服务提供程序将分配的最合适的本地网络地址和端口号。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol and do not call before calling , the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local network address and port number. 如果您使用的是无连接协议，直到您调用，服务提供程序将不分配本地网络地址和端口号或方法。If you are using a connectionless protocol, the service provider will not assign a local network address and port number until you call the or method. 如果你想要更改默认远程主机，则调用方法再次使用所需终结点。If you want to change the default remote host, call the method again with the desired endpoint. 若要取消挂起调用方法，关闭。To cancel a pending call to the method, close the . 当回调的异步操作正在进行中时，调用方法，提供给调用方法。When the method is called while an asynchronous operation is in progress, the callback provided to the method is called. 随后调用方法将引发以指示已取消该操作。A subsequent call to the method will throw an to indicate that the operation has been cancelled. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 如果以前已断开此套接字，然后必须在操作完成之前不会退出的线程上调用。If this socket has previously been disconnected, then must be called on a thread that will not exit until the operation is complete. 这是基础提供程序的限制。This is a limitation of the underlying provider. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 为异步缓存的执行上下文 （的安全上下文中，被模拟的用户，并在调用上下文）方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 后首次使用特定的上下文 (特定于异步方法中，特定实例和特定的回调)，以后使用该上下文将看到性能的改进。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例启动异步连接尝试。The following code example initiates an asynchronous connection attempt. [!code-cpp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/VB/source.vb#1)]

overloads, or . 若要取消挂起调用方法，关闭。To cancel a pending call to the method, close the . 当回调的异步操作正在进行中时，调用方法，提供给调用方法。When the method is called while an asynchronous operation is in progress, the callback provided to the method is called. 随后调用方法将引发以指示已取消该操作。A subsequent call to the method will throw an to indicate that the operation has been cancelled. summary.span: 主机由主机名和端口号指定。

span.span: The host is specified by a host name and a port number.

returns.span: 引用异步连接的 。

span.span: An that references the asynchronous connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 异步完成操作，必须通过调用方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`requestCallback`委托。Typically, the method is invoked by the `requestCallback` delegate. 此方法不会阻止，直到完成该操作。This method does not block until the operation is complete. 若要阻止，直到完成该操作后，使用之一方法重载。To block until the operation is complete, use one of the method overloads. 若要取消挂起调用方法，关闭。To cancel a pending call to the method, close the . 当回调的异步操作正在进行中时，调用方法，提供给调用方法。When the method is called while an asynchronous operation is in progress, the callback provided to the method is called. 随后调用方法将引发以指示已取消该操作。A subsequent call to the method will throw an to indicate that the operation has been cancelled. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 如果以前已断开此套接字，然后必须在操作完成之前不会退出的线程上调用。If this socket has previously been disconnected, then must be called on a thread that will not exit until the operation is complete. 这是基础提供程序的限制。This is a limitation of the underlying provider. 此外，它是使用必须不同。Also the that is used must be different. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 为异步缓存的执行上下文 （的安全上下文中，被模拟的用户，并在调用上下文）方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 后首次使用特定的上下文 (特定于异步方法中，特定实例和特定的回调)，以后使用该上下文将看到性能的改进。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例启动异步连接尝试。The following code example initiates an asynchronous connection attempt. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect/CPP/beginconnect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect/CS/beginconnect.cs#1)] [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect/CPP/beginconnect.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Socket.BeginConnect/CS/beginconnect.cs#3)]

summary.span: 开始异步请求从远程终结点断开连接。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous request to disconnect from a remote endpoint.

returns.span: 一个 对象，它引用异步操作。

span.span: An object that references the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用的是面向连接的协议，则可以调用方法来请求从远程终结点断开连接。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you can call the method to request a disconnect from a remote endpoint. 如果`reuseSocket`是`true`，可以重复使用套接字。If `reuseSocket` is `true`, you can reuse the socket. 方法使用一个单独的线程来调用指定的回调方法。The method uses a separate thread to invoke the specified callback method. 方法进行阻止，直到挂起的断开连接已完成。The method blocks until the pending disconnect is complete. 有关编写回调方法的其他信息，请参阅[委托作为回调方法进行封送](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods, see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到异常，请使用属性来获取特定错误代码。If you receive a exception, use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的套接字进行异步通信，并将一些数据发送到远程主机。The following code example creates a socket for asynchronous communication and sends some data to a remote host. 已发送数据，调用来停止发送和接收活动。When the data has been sent, is called to stop the send and receive activity. 然后调用以开始断开连接请求。Then is called to begin a disconnect request. 完成请求后，属性进行查询，以测试是否已断开连接的套接字。When the request completes, the property is queried to test whether the socket is disconnected. [!code-cpp[Nclsocketenhancements#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketEnhancements/CPP/nclsocketenhancements.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[Nclsocketenhancements#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketEnhancements/CS/nclsocketenhancements.cs#11)]

此方法不会阻止，直到完成该操作。This method does not block until the operation is complete. 若要阻止，直到完成该操作后，使用之一方法重载。To block until the operation is complete, use one of the method overloads. 若要取消挂起，调用方法。To cancel a pending , call the method. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 由给定线程启动的所有 i/o 操作被取消时该线程退出。All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits. 如果在线程退出该操作完成之前，挂起的异步操作可能会失败。A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes. > [!NOTE] > `state` 是用户定义的实例化。`state` is an instantiation of a user-defined class. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework (特定于异步方法中，特定实例和特定的回调)，以后使用该上下文将看到性能的改进。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 异步完成操作，必须通过调用方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`callback`委托。Typically, the method is invoked by the `callback` delegate. 此方法不会阻止，直到完成该操作。This method does not block until the operation is complete. 若要阻止，直到完成该操作后，使用之一方法重载。To block until the operation is complete, use one of the method overloads. 若要取消挂起，调用方法。To cancel a pending , call the method. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 由给定线程启动的所有 i/o 操作被取消时该线程退出。All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits. 如果在线程退出该操作完成之前，挂起的异步操作可能会失败。A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes. > [!NOTE] > `state` 是用户定义的实例化。`state` is an instantiation of a user-defined class. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 为异步缓存的执行上下文 （的安全上下文中，被模拟的用户，并在调用上下文）方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 后首次使用特定的上下文 (特定于异步方法中，特定实例和特定的回调)，以后使用该上下文将看到性能的改进。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法开始以异步方式从远程主机中读取无连接的数据报。The method starts asynchronously reading connectionless datagrams from a remote host. 调用方法使您能够收到单独的执行线程中的数据。Calling the method gives you the ability to receive data within a separate execution thread. 可以创建实现一个回调方法委托并将传递到其名称方法。You can create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 为此，至少，你`state`参数必须包含已连接或默认正用于通信。To do this, at the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the connected or default being used for communication. 如果回调需要详细信息，可以创建一个小类来保存和其他所需的信息。If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class to hold the and the other required information. 传递到此类的实例方法通过`state`参数。Pass an instance of this class to the method through the `state` parameter. 回调方法应该调用方法。Your callback method should invoke the method. 当应用程序调用，系统将使用一个单独的线程来执行指定的回调方法，且它将阻止上直到读取数据或引发异常。When your application calls , the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and it will block on until the reads data or throws an exception. 如果你想要阻止调用后的原始线程方法，请使用。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use . 当你想要继续执行的原始线程时请在回调方法调用 Set 方法。Call the Set method on a T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 有关编写回调方法的其他信息，请参阅[委托作为回调方法进行封送](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods, see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). > [!NOTE] > 然后再调用，则必须显式将绑定到本地终结点使用方法，或将引发。Before calling , you must explicitly bind the to a local endpoint using the method, or will throw a . 此方法将数据读入`buffer`参数，并捕获的远程主机终结点从其发送数据。This method reads data into the `buffer` parameter, and captures the remote host endpoint from which the data is sent. 有关如何检索此终结点的信息，请参阅。For information on how to retrieve this endpoint, refer to . 此方法是最有用，如果你想要以异步方式从未知的主机或多个主机接收无连接的数据报。This method is most useful if you intend to asynchronously receive connectionless datagrams from an unknown host or multiple hosts. 在这些情况下，将读取第一个排队数据报接收到的本地网络缓冲区。In these cases, will read the first enqueued datagram received into the local network buffer. 如果你收到的数据报大于的大小`buffer`，则方法将填充`buffer`太多的是，且引发的消息与。If the datagram you receive is larger than the size of `buffer`, the method will fill `buffer` with as much of the message as is possible, and throw a . 如果使用的不可靠的协议，则多余的数据将丢失。If you are using an unreliable protocol, the excess data will be lost. 如果您使用的是可靠的协议，多余的数据将保留由服务提供商可以通过调用检索它方法使用一个足够大的缓冲区。If you are using a reliable protocol, the excess data will be retained by the service provider and you can retrieve it by calling the method with a large enough buffer. 若要保证始终返回远程主机终结点、 应用程序应显式将绑定到本地终结点使用方法，然后调用方法替换`optionLevel`参数设置为或根据需要，`optionName`参数设置为，并`optionValue`参数来启用此选项之前，调用方法。To guarantee that the remote host endpoint is always returned, an application should explicitly bind the to a local endpoint using the method and then call the method with the `optionLevel` parameter set to or as appropriate, the `optionName` parameter set to , and the `optionValue` parameter to enable this option before calling the method. 否则，它是可能的远程主机终结点以接收方已调用之前，发件人已发送的数据报的数量时不会返回方法。Otherwise, it is possible for the remote host endpoint to not be returned when the sender has sent a number of datagrams before the receiver has called the method. 尽管适用于无连接协议，你可以使用面向连接的协议也。Although is intended for connectionless protocols, you can use a connection-oriented protocol as well. 如果你选择这样做，则必须首先可以建立远程主机连接通过调用 / 方法或通过调用接受传入连接请求或方法。If you choose to do so, you must first either establish a remote host connection by calling the / method or accept an incoming connection request by calling the or method. 如果您调用方法之前建立或接受的连接时，你将获取。If you call the method before establishing or accepting a connection, you will get a . 您还可以建立默认远程主机之前调用的无连接协议方法。You can also establish a default remote host for a connectionless protocol prior to calling the method. 在这些情况下，任一方法将忽略`remoteEP`参数和仅接收来自连接的数据或默认远程主机。In either of these cases, the method will ignore the `remoteEP` parameter and only receive data from the connected or default remote host. 使用面向连接的套接字将读取的数据，可最多指定的字节数`size`参数。With connection-oriented sockets, will read as much data as is available up to the number of bytes specified by the `size` parameter. 若要取消挂起，调用方法。To cancel a pending , call the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 为异步缓存的执行上下文 （的安全上下文中，被模拟的用户，并在调用上下文）方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 后首次使用特定的上下文 (特定于异步方法中，特定实例和特定的回调)，以后使用该上下文将看到性能的改进。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例以异步方式从远程主机接收无连接的数据报。The following code example asynchronously receives connectionless datagrams from a remote host. [!code-cpp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#41](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CPP/source.cpp#41)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#41](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CS/source.cs#41)] [!code-vb[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#41](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/VB/source.vb#41)]

(特定于异步方法中，特定实例和特定的回调)，以后使用该上下文将看到性能的改进。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法启动异步发送操作中建立的远程主机， ， ，或方法。The method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host established in the , , , or method. 如果不首先调用将引发异常， ， ，或。 will throw an exception if you do not first call , , , or . 调用方法使你能够发送单独的执行线程中的数据。Calling the method gives you the ability to send data within a separate execution thread. 可以创建实现一个回调方法委托并将传递到其名称方法。You can create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 为此，至少，你`state`参数必须包含已连接或默认正用于通信。To do this, at the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the connected or default being used for communication. 如果回调需要详细信息，可以创建较小的类或结构，用于保存和其他所需的信息。If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class or structure to hold the and the other required information. 传递到此类的实例方法通过`state`参数。Pass an instance of this class to the method through the `state` parameter. 回调方法应该调用方法。Your callback method should invoke the method. 当应用程序调用，系统将使用一个单独的线程来执行指定的回调方法，并阻止直到发送请求的字节数或引发异常。When your application calls , the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and will block on until the sends the number of bytes requested or throws an exception. 如果你想要阻止调用后的原始线程方法，请使用方法。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use the method. 当你想要继续执行的原始线程时请在回调方法调用 Set 方法。Call the Set method on a T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 编写回调方法的其他信息，请参阅[委托作为回调方法进行封送](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 适用于面向连接的协议，尽管无连接协议，也适用，前提是先调用或方法以建立默认远程主机。Although intended for connection-oriented protocols, also works for connectionless protocols, provided that you first call the or method to establish a default remote host. 如果使用无连接协议，并且打算将数据发送到多个不同的主机，则应使用。If you are using a connectionless protocol and plan to send data to several different hosts, you should use . 可以使用甚至已建立默认远程主机使用后。It is okay to use even after you have established a default remote host with . 您还可以更改默认远程主机之前调用到另一个调用，从而或。You can also change the default remote host prior to calling by making another call to or . 使用无连接协议时，您还必须确保在缓冲区的大小不超过基础服务提供程序的最大数据包大小。With connectionless protocols, you must also be sure that the size of your buffer does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 如果是这样，将不发送数据报并将引发。If it does, the datagram will not be sent and will throw a . 如果指定标记为`socketflags`参数，不会将路由发送的数据。If you specify the flag as the `socketflags` parameter, the data you are sending will not be routed. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 由给定线程启动的所有 i/o 操作被取消时该线程退出。All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits. 如果在线程退出该操作完成之前，挂起的异步操作可能会失败。A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes. > [!NOTE] > `state` 是用户定义的实例化。`state` is an instantiation of a user-defined class. > [!NOTE] > 发送的成功完成并不表示数据已成功传递。The successful completion of a send does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered. 如果任何缓冲区空间以容纳要传输的数据在传输系统中不不可用，除非套接字置于阻止模式下，将阻止发送。If no buffer space is available within the transport system to hold the data to be transmitted, send will block unless the socket has been placed in nonblocking mode. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 为异步缓存的执行上下文 （的安全上下文中，被模拟的用户，并在调用上下文）方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 后首次使用特定的上下文 (特定于异步方法中，特定实例和特定的回调)，以后使用该上下文将看到性能的改进。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法启动异步发送操作中建立的远程主机， ， ，或方法。The method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host established in the , , , or method. 如果不首先调用将引发异常， ， ，或。 will throw an exception if you do not first call , , , or . 调用方法使你能够发送单独的执行线程中的数据。Calling the method gives you the ability to send data within a separate execution thread. 可以创建实现一个回调方法委托并将传递到其名称方法。You can create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 为此，至少，你`state`参数必须包含已连接或默认正用于通信。To do this, at the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the connected or default being used for communication. 如果回调需要详细信息，可以创建较小的类或结构，用于保存和其他所需的信息。If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class or structure to hold the and the other required information. 传递到此类的实例方法通过`state`参数。Pass an instance of this class to the method through the `state` parameter. 回调方法应该调用方法。Your callback method should invoke the method. 当应用程序调用，系统将使用一个单独的线程来执行指定的回调方法，并阻止直到发送请求的字节数或引发异常。When your application calls , the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and will block on until the sends the number of bytes requested or throws an exception. 如果你想要阻止调用后的原始线程方法，请使用方法。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use the method. 当你想要继续执行的原始线程时请在回调方法调用 Set 方法。Call the Set method on a T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 编写回调方法的其他信息，请参阅[委托作为回调方法进行封送](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 适用于面向连接的协议，尽管无连接协议，也适用，前提是先调用或方法以建立默认远程主机。Although intended for connection-oriented protocols, also works for connectionless protocols, provided that you first call the or method to establish a default remote host. 如果使用无连接协议，并且打算将数据发送到多个不同的主机，则应使用。If you are using a connectionless protocol and plan to send data to several different hosts, you should use . 可以使用甚至已建立默认远程主机使用后。It is okay to use even after you have established a default remote host with . 您还可以更改默认远程主机之前调用到另一个调用，从而或。You can also change the default remote host prior to calling by making another call to or . 使用无连接协议时，您还必须确保在缓冲区的大小不超过基础服务提供程序的最大数据包大小。With connectionless protocols, you must also be sure that the size of your buffer does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 如果是这样，将不发送数据报并将引发。If it does, the datagram will not be sent and will throw a . 如果指定标记为`socketflags`参数，不会将路由发送的数据。If you specify the flag as the `socketflags` parameter, the data you are sending will not be routed. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 由给定线程启动的所有 i/o 操作被取消时该线程退出。All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits. 如果在线程退出该操作完成之前，挂起的异步操作可能会失败。A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes. > [!NOTE] > `state` 是用户定义的实例化。`state` is an instantiation of a user-defined class. > [!NOTE] > 发送的成功完成并不表示数据已成功传递。The successful completion of a send does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered. 如果任何缓冲区空间以容纳要传输的数据在传输系统中不不可用，除非套接字置于阻止模式下，将阻止发送。If no buffer space is available within the transport system to hold the data to be transmitted, send will block unless the socket has been placed in nonblocking mode. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 为异步缓存的执行上下文 （的安全上下文中，被模拟的用户，并在调用上下文）方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 后首次使用特定的上下文 (特定于异步方法中，特定实例和特定的回调)，以后使用该上下文将看到性能的改进。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例开始以异步方式将数据发送到远程主机。The following code example begins asynchronously sending data to a remote host. [!code-cpp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CPP/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/VB/source.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载将该文件发送`fileName`到连接的套接字。This overload sends the file `fileName` to the connected socket. 如果`fileName`是在本地目录中，它可能会标识只是该文件的名称; 否则，必须指定完整路径和文件的名称。If `fileName` is in the local directory, it may be identified with just the name of the file; otherwise, the full path and name of the file must be specified. 通配符 ("...\\\myfile.txt") 和 UNC 共享名 ("\\\\\\\shared directory\\\myfile.txt") 支持。Wildcards ("..\\\myfile.txt") and UNC share names ("\\\\\\\shared directory\\\myfile.txt") are supported. 如果未找到文件，该异常引发。If the file is not found, the exception is thrown. 此方法使用`TransmitFile`Windows Sockets 2 API 中找到函数。This method uses the `TransmitFile` function found in the Windows Sockets 2 API. 有关详细信息`TransmitFile`函数和它的标志，请参阅 MSDN 库中的 Windows 套接字文档。For more information about the `TransmitFile` function and its flags, see the Windows Sockets documentation in the MSDN Library. 方法启动异步发送操作中建立的远程主机，， ，或方法。The method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host established in the ,, , or methods. 如果不首先调用将引发异常， ， ，或。 throws an exception if you do not first call , , , or . 调用方法使您能够发送单独的执行线程中的文件。Calling the method enables you to send a file within a separate execution thread. 若要完成该操作，可以创建由调用的回调方法委托参数。To complete the operation, you can create a callback method that is invoked by the delegate parameter. 为此，在最低限度下，`state`参数必须包含对象用于进行通信。To do this, at the very minimum, the `state` parameter must contain the object being used for communication. 如果回调需要详细信息，可以创建类或结构，用于保存和其他所需的信息。If your callback needs more information, you can create a class or structure to hold the and the other required information. 传递到此自定义对象的实例方法通过`state`参数。Pass an instance of this custom object to the method through the `state` parameter. 回调方法必须调用方法。Your callback method must invoke the method. 当应用程序调用，系统使用一个单独的线程来执行指定的回调方法，并阻止上直到发送整个文件或引发异常。When your application calls , the system uses a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and blocks on until the sends the entire file or throws an exception. 编写回调方法的其他信息，请参阅[委托作为回调方法进行封送](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 适用于面向连接的协议，尽管无连接协议，也适用，前提是先调用或方法以建立默认远程主机。Although intended for connection-oriented protocols, also works for connectionless protocols, provided that you first call the or method to establish a default remote host. 使用无连接协议时，您必须确保文件的大小不超过基础服务提供程序的最大数据包大小。With connectionless protocols, you must be sure that the size of your file does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 如果是这样，不发送数据报并引发异常。If it does, the datagram is not sent and throws a exception. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到异常，请使用属性来获取特定错误代码。If you receive a exception, use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 为异步缓存的执行上下文 （的安全上下文中，被模拟的用户，并在调用上下文）方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 后首次使用特定的上下文 (特定于异步方法中，特定实例和特定的回调)，以后使用该上下文将看到性能的改进。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并连接的套接字进行异步通信。The following code example creates and connects a socket for asynchronous communication. 首先，"text.txt"的文件是以异步方式发送，到远程主机。First, the file "text.txt" is sent asynchronously to the remote host. 回调委托调用完成传输。The callback delegate calls to complete the transmission. calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 后首次使用特定的上下文 (特定于异步方法中，特定实例和特定的回调)，以后使用该上下文将看到性能的改进。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建和连接进行异步通信套接字并开始将文件"text.txt"以异步方式发送到远程主机。The following code example creates and connects a socket for asynchronous communication and begins sending the file "text.txt" asynchronously to the remote host. 在此示例中，`preBuffer`和一个`postBuffer`的数据创建要与文件和默认值一起发送使用值。In this example, a `preBuffer` and a `postBuffer` of data is created to send with the file and the default value is used. 回调委托调用完成传输。The callback delegate calls to complete the transmission. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法启动异步发送操作中指定的远程主机到`remoteEP`参数。The method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host specified in the `remoteEP` parameter. 调用方法使你能够发送单独的执行线程中的数据。Calling the method gives you the ability to send data within a separate execution thread. 适用于无连接协议，尽管适用于无连接和面向连接的协议。Although intended for connectionless protocols, works with both connectionless and connection-oriented protocols. 可以创建实现一个回调方法委托并将传递到其名称方法。You can create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 为此，至少，你`state`参数必须包含已连接或默认正用于通信。To do this, at the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the connected or default being used for communication. 如果回调需要详细信息，可以创建一个小类来保存，和其他所需的信息。If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class to hold the , and the other required information. 传递到此类的实例方法通过`state`参数。Pass an instance of this class to the method through the `state` parameter. 回调方法应该调用方法。Your callback method should invoke the method. 当应用程序调用，系统将使用一个单独的线程来执行指定的回调方法，并阻止直到发送请求的字节数或引发异常。When your application calls , the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and will block on until the sends the number of bytes requested or throws an exception. 如果你想要阻止调用后的原始线程方法，请使用方法。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use the method. 当你想要继续执行的原始线程时请在回调方法调用 Set 方法。Call the Set method on a T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 有关编写回调方法的其他信息请参阅[委托作为回调方法进行封送](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information about writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 如果使用的是面向连接的协议，必须首先调用， ， ，或方法，或将引发。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must first call the , , , or method, or will throw a . 将忽略`remoteEP`参数并将数据发送到中建立， ， ，或方法。 will ignore the `remoteEP` parameter and send data to the established in the , , , or method. 如果使用的是无连接协议，不需要建立默认远程主机使用或方法之前调用。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you do not need to establish a default remote host with the or method prior to calling . 只需执行此操作，如果你想要调用方法。You only need to do this if you intend to call the method. 如果调用或方法，然后调用，则`remoteEP`参数将替代指定的默认远程主机，只为发送操作。If you do call the or method prior to calling , the `remoteEP` parameter will override the specified default remote host for that send operation only. 也不需要调用方法。You are also not required to call the method. 在这种情况下，基础服务提供程序将分配的最合适的本地网络地址和端口号。In this case, the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local network address and port number. 如果你想要选择可用端口的基础服务提供程序，请使用端口号 0。Use a port number of zero if you want the underlying service provider to select a free port. 如果你需要标识分配的本地网络地址和端口号，则可以使用属性后的方法成功完成。If you need to identify the assigned local network address and port number, you can use the property after the method successfully completes. 如果你想要将数据发送到的广播地址，则必须首先调用方法，设置套接字选项设为。If you want to send data to a broadcast address, you must first call the method and set the socket option to . -您还必须确保在缓冲区的大小不超过基础服务提供程序的最大数据包大小。-You must also be sure that the size of your buffer does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 如果是这样，将不发送数据报并将引发。If it does, the datagram will not be sent and will throw a . 如果指定标记为`socketflags`参数，不会将路由发送的数据。If you specify the flag as the `socketflags` parameter, the data you are sending will not be routed. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 为异步缓存的执行上下文 （的安全上下文中，被模拟的用户，并在调用上下文）方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 后首次使用特定的上下文 (特定于异步方法中，特定实例和特定的回调)，以后使用该上下文将看到性能的改进。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例以异步方式将数据发送到指定的远程主机。The following code example asynchronously sends data to the specified remote host. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法如果你需要使用特定的本地终结点。Use the method if you need to use a specific local endpoint. 必须调用调用之前方法。You must call before you can call the method. 不需要调用之前使用方法除非您需要使用特定的本地终结点。You do not need to call before using the method unless you need to use a specific local endpoint. 可以使用上无连接和面向连接的协议方法。You can use the method on both connectionless and connection-oriented protocols. 然后再调用，必须先创建本地从想要进行数据通信。Before calling , you must first create the local from which you intend to communicate data. 如果您不介意分配的本地地址，则可以创建使用地址参数，以及基础的服务提供程序将分配的最合适的网络地址。If you do not care which local address is assigned, you can create an using as the address parameter, and the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate network address. 这可能有助于简化您的应用程序，如果有多个网络接口。This might help simplify your application if you have multiple network interfaces. 如果你不关心使用哪个本地端口，可以创建使用 0 作为端口号。If you do not care which local port is used, you can create an using 0 for the port number. 在这种情况下，服务提供商将分配可用的端口号介于 1024年和 5000 之间。In this case, the service provider will assign an available port number between 1024 and 5000. 如果使用上述方法，可以发现哪些本地网络地址和端口号已分配通过调用。If you use the above approach, you can discover what local network address and port number has been assigned by calling the . 如果使用面向连接的协议进行调用后不会返回之前的本地分配的网络地址或方法。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, will not return the locally assigned network address until after you have made a call to the or method. 如果使用的是无连接协议，将不具有访问此信息，直到已完成发送或接收。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you will not have access to this information until you have completed a send or receive. 如果 UDP 套接字想要接收接口上接收数据包的信息套接字选项设置为应显式调用方法后立即调用方法。If a UDP socket wants to receive interface information on received packets, the method should be explicitly called with the socket option set to immediately after calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果您想要接收多播数据报，必须调用方法具有多路广播的端口号。If you intend to receive multicast datagrams, you must call the method with a multicast port number. > [!NOTE] > 必须调用方法，如果你想要接收无连接的数据报使用方法。You must call the method if you intend to receive connectionless datagrams using the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到调用时方法，请使用属性来获取特定错误代码。If you receive a when calling the method, use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例绑定使用指定的本地终结点。The following code example binds a using the specified local endpoint. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否处于阻止模式。The property indicates whether a is in blocking mode. 如果您是在阻止模式下，并且进行方法调用这不会立即完成，你的应用程序将请求的操作完成之前阻止执行。If you are in blocking mode, and you make a method call which does not complete immediately, your application will block execution until the requested operation completes. 如果要继续执行，即使请求的操作未完成，更改执行属性设置为`false`。If you want execution to continue even though the requested operation is not complete, change the property to `false`. 属性不起对异步方法。The property has no effect on asynchronous methods. 如果是发送和接收数据以异步方式并且想要阻止执行，使用类。If you are sending and receiving data asynchronously and want to block execution, use the class. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法关闭远程主机连接和版本的所有托管和非托管资源与关联。The method closes the remote host connection and releases all managed and unmanaged resources associated with the . 在关闭之后属性设置为`false`。Upon closing, the property is set to `false`. 对于面向连接的协议，建议您调用之前调用方法。For connection-oriented protocols, it is recommended that you call before calling the method. 这可确保发送和关闭之前连接的套接字上接收到的所有数据。This ensures that all data is sent and received on the connected socket before it is closed. 如果您需要调用没有首先调用，可以确保数据的情况下设置发送传出传输排入队列选项设为`false`并指定非零的超时间隔。If you need to call without first calling , you can ensure that data queued for outgoing transmission will be sent by setting the option to `false` and specifying a non-zero time-out interval. 然后会阻止发送此数据之前或直到指定的超时时间已到。 will then block until this data is sent or until the specified time-out expires. 如果您设置到`false`并指定为零的超时间隔、释放连接，并会自动放弃传出队列的数据。If you set to `false` and specify a zero time-out interval, releases the connection and automatically discards outgoing queued data. > [!NOTE] > 若要设置套接字选项`false`，创建，将启用的属性设置为`true`，并设置属性设置为所需的超时时间。To set the socket option to `false`, create a , set the enabled property to `true`, and set the property to the desired time out period. 使用此连同套接字选项调用方法。Use this along with the socket option to call the method. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例关闭。The following code example closes a . [!code-cpp[Classic Socket.Close Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Close Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Socket.Close Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Close Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Socket.Close Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Close Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 关闭 连接并释放所有与指定超时关联的资源，以允许要发送的数据排队。

span.span: Closes the connection and releases all associated resources with a specified timeout to allow queued data to be sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法关闭远程主机连接和版本的所有托管和非托管资源与关联。The method closes the remote host connection and releases all managed and unmanaged resources associated with the . 在关闭之后属性设置为`false`。Upon closing, the property is set to `false`. 对于面向连接的协议，建议您调用之前调用。For connection-oriented protocols, it is recommended that you call before calling . 这可确保发送和关闭之前连接的套接字上接收到的所有数据。This ensures that all data is sent and received on the connected socket before it is closed. 如果您需要调用没有首先调用，可以确保数据的情况下设置发送传出传输排入队列选项设为`false`并指定非零的超时间隔。If you need to call without first calling , you can ensure that data queued for outgoing transmission will be sent by setting the option to `false` and specifying a non-zero time-out interval. 然后会阻止发送此数据之前或直到指定的超时时间已到。 will then block until this data is sent or until the specified time-out expires. 如果您设置到`false`并指定为零的超时间隔、释放连接，并会自动放弃传出队列的数据。If you set to `false` and specify a zero time-out interval, releases the connection and automatically discards outgoing queued data. > [!NOTE] > 若要设置套接字选项`false`，创建，将启用的属性设置为`true`，并设置属性设置为所需的超时期限。To set the socket option to `false`, create a , set the enabled property to `true`, and set the property to the desired time-out period. 使用此连同套接字选项调用方法。Use this along with the socket option to call the method. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何关闭。The following code example demonstrates how to close a . [!code-cpp[Classic Socket.Close Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Close Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Socket.Close Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Close Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Socket.Close Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Close Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 与远程主机建立连接。

span.span: Establishes a connection to a remote host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用面向连接的协议 TCP，如方法以同步方式建立网络连接之间和指定的远程终结点。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol such as TCP, the method synchronously establishes a network connection between and the specified remote endpoint. 如果您使用的是无连接协议，建立默认远程主机。If you are using a connectionless protocol, establishes a default remote host. 调用后，可以将数据发送到远程设备与方法，或从使用的远程设备接收数据方法。After you call , you can send data to the remote device with the method, or receive data from the remote device with the method. 如果使用如 UDP 是无连接协议，不需要调用之前发送和接收数据。If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you do not have to call before sending and receiving data. 可以使用和能够与远程主机同步通信。You can use and to synchronously communicate with a remote host. 如果调用，将丢弃来自指定的默认值以外的地址的任何数据报。If you do call , any datagrams that arrive from an address other than the specified default will be discarded. 如果你想要将默认远程主机到广播地址，必须先调用方法，设置套接字选项设置为，或将引发。If you want to set your default remote host to a broadcast address, you must first call the method and set the socket option to , or will throw a . 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. 方法将阻止，除非专门设置了相应属性设置为`false`之前调用。The method will block, unless you specifically set the property to `false` prior to calling . 如果要使用面向连接的协议 TCP，并且确实禁用阻塞等将引发因为它需要时间来建立连接。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol like TCP and you do disable blocking, will throw a because it needs time to make the connection. 无连接协议将引发异常，因为它们只需建立默认远程主机。Connectionless protocols will not throw an exception because they simply establish a default remote host. 可以使用若要获取特定的错误代码。You can use to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. 如果 WSAEWOULDBLOCK 返回的错误，已通过面向连接的发起远程主机连接，但未尚未成功完成。If the error returned WSAEWOULDBLOCK, the remote host connection has been initiated by a connection-oriented , but has not yet completed successfully. 使用方法来确定何时完成连接。Use the method to determine when the is finished connecting. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用的是面向连接的协议和未调用之前调用，基础服务提供程序将分配的本地网络地址和端口号。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol and did not call before calling , the underlying service provider will assign the local network address and port number. 如果使用的是无连接协议，服务提供程序将不会分配本地网络地址和端口号，直到完成发送或接收操作。If you are using a connectionless protocol, the service provider will not assign a local network address and port number until you complete a send or receive operation. 如果你想要更改默认远程主机，则调用再次使用所需终结点。If you want to change the default remote host, call again with the desired endpoint. > [!NOTE] > 如果之前断开连接的套接字，则不能使用此方法以还原连接。If the socket has been previously disconnected, then you cannot use this method to restore the connection. 使用异步之一方法来重新连接。Use one of the asynchronous methods to reconnect. 这是基础提供程序的限制。This is a limitation of the underlying provider. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例连接到远程终结点，并接着验证连接。The following code example connects to a remote endpoint and then verifies the connection. [!code-cpp[Classic Socket.Connect Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Connect Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Socket.Connect Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Connect Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Socket.Connect Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Connect Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. 如果 WSAEWOULDBLOCK 返回的错误，已通过面向连接的发起远程主机连接，但未尚未成功完成。If the error returned WSAEWOULDBLOCK, the remote host connection has been initiated by a connection-oriented , but has not yet completed successfully. 使用方法来确定何时完成连接。Use the method to determine when the is finished connecting. 如果启用了 IPv6 和调用方法来连接到的主机，解析为 IPv6 和 IPv4 地址、 IPv6 地址将与连接尝试之前的 IPv4 地址的第一个。If IPv6 is enabled and the method is called to connect to a host that resolves to both IPv6 and IPv4 addresses, the connection to the IPv6 address will be attempted first before the IPv4 address. 这可能会延迟的时间来建立连接，如果主机未侦听 IPv6 地址。This may have the effect of delaying the time to establish the connection if the host is not listening on the IPv6 address. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用的是面向连接的协议和未调用之前调用，基础服务提供程序将分配的本地网络地址和端口号。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol and did not call before calling , the underlying service provider will assign the local network address and port number. 如果使用的是无连接协议，服务提供程序将不会分配本地网络地址和端口号，直到完成发送或接收操作。If you are using a connectionless protocol, the service provider will not assign a local network address and port number until you complete a send or receive operation. 如果你想要更改默认远程主机，则调用再次使用所需终结点。If you want to change the default remote host, call again with the desired endpoint. > [!NOTE] > 如果之前断开连接的套接字，则不能使用此方法以还原连接。If the socket has been previously disconnected, then you cannot use this method to restore the connection. 使用异步之一方法来重新连接。Use one of the asynchronous methods to reconnect. 这是基础提供程序的限制。This is a limitation of the underlying provider. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例连接到远程终结点，并接着验证连接。The following code example connects to a remote endpoint and then verifies the connection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用面向连接的协议方法启动与远程主机的连接的异步请求。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, the method starts an asynchronous request for a connection to the remote host. 如果您使用的是无连接协议，建立默认远程主机。If you are using a connectionless protocol, establishes a default remote host. 若要在完成时得到通知，必须创建实现事件处理程序的回调方法\ 委托并将附加到回调事件。To be notified of completion, you must create a callback method that implements the EventHandler\ delegate and attach the callback to the event. 调用方必须设置属性设置为要连接到的远程主机。The caller must set the property to the of the remote host to connect to. 调用方可能会设置属性设置为在调用之前所需的任何用户状态对象方法，以便可在回调方法中检索信息。The caller may set the property to any user state object desired before calling the method, so that the information will be retrievable in the callback method. 如果回调需要比单个对象的详细信息，可以创建一个小类来保存作为成员的其他所需的状态信息。If the callback needs more information than a single object, a small class can be created to hold the other required state information as members. 如果使用如 UDP 是无连接协议，不需要调用之前发送和接收数据。If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you do not have to call before sending and receiving data. 可以使用和与远程主机通信。You can use and to communicate with a remote host. 如果调用，将丢弃来自指定的默认值以外的地址的任何数据报。If you do call , any datagrams that arrive from an address other than the specified default will be discarded. 如果你想要更改默认远程主机，则调用方法再次使用所需终结点。If you want to change the default remote host, call the method again with the desired endpoint. 如果你想要设置默认远程主机与广播地址，必须先调用设置为广播和`true`。If you wish to set the default remote host to a broadcast address, you must first call and set Broadcast to `true`. 如果不执行此操作，方法将引发。If this is not done, the method will throw a . 下列属性和事件上的对象所需：The following properties and events on the object are required: - - （可选） 一个缓冲区可能会提供它以原子方式发送后在套接字上方法成功。Optionally, a buffer may be provided which will atomically be sent on the socket after the method succeeds. 在这种情况下，属性应设置为包含数据的缓冲区，以发送和属性应设置为的数据的字节数，以从缓冲区发送。In this case, the property needs to be set to the buffer containing the data to send and the property needs to be set to the number of bytes of data to send from the buffer. 一旦建立的连接，该缓冲区中的数据会被发送。Once a connection is established, this buffer of data is sent. 如果您使用的是面向连接的协议，并且不会调用之前调用，基础服务提供程序将分配的最合适的本地网络地址和端口号。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol and do not call before calling , the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local network address and port number. 如果您使用的是无连接协议，直到您调用，服务提供程序将不分配本地网络 IP 地址和端口号或方法。If you are using a connectionless protocol, the service provider will not assign a local network IP address and port number until you call the or methods. 方法会抛出如果的地址族和不是同一地址系列。The method throws if the address family of the and the are not the same address family. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到调用此方法时，使用属性来获取特定错误代码。If you receive a when calling this method, use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档在 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.

span.span: if the was connected to a remote resource as of the most recent operation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Connected`属性获取的连接状态截止到最后一个 I/O 操作。The `Connected` property gets the connection state of the as of the last I/O operation. 如果该属性返回`false`，则要么从未连接，或已断开连接。When it returns `false`, the was either never connected, or is no longer connected. 值属性反映最新操作时的连接的状态。The value of the property reflects the state of the connection as of the most recent operation. 如果您需要确定连接的当前状态，请调用非阻止性、 零字节发送。If you need to determine the current state of the connection, make a nonblocking, zero-byte Send call. 如果调用成功返回或引发 WAEWOULDBLOCK 错误代码 (10035)，则仍连接套接字;否则，无法再连接套接字。If the call returns successfully or throws a WAEWOULDBLOCK error code (10035), then the socket is still connected; otherwise, the socket is no longer connected. 如果您调用对用户数据报协议 (UDP) 套接字属性始终返回`true`; 但是，此操作不会更改无连接的固有 UDP 性质。If you call on a User Datagram Protocol (UDP) socket, the property always returns `true`; however, this action does not change the inherent connectionless nature of UDP. ## Examples 下面的代码示例连接到远程终结点，检查属性，并检查连接的当前状态。The following code example connects to a remote endpoint, checks the property, and checks the current state of the connection. [!code-cpp[Classic Socket.Connect Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Connect Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Socket.Connect Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Connect Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Socket.Connect Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Connect Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
